title: Add 'Shop is Awakening' announcement to top of public Shop page

requirements.text: Add the provided "Shop is Awakening" announcement message to the existing public Shop page/tab (frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx) and render it near the top of the page content, above the current shop controls/products content, styled consistently with the rest of the site using existing layout/components (e.g., PageLayout, FadeInSection, shadcn Card/Alert, existing theme classes). The announcement text must be displayed exactly as provided (including punctuation and the ✨).

quotes:
The Shop is Awakening…

Our enchanted marketplace is still gathering its magic, and online purchases are not quite available yet. But worry not—your quests and creations need not wait. You may request a custom quote or personalized quest directly through our website, or send a message through Facebook Messenger, Instagram, or TikTok, where we happily discuss custom items, handcrafted products, and unique freelance creations made just for you.

Until the shop fully opens its doors, these pathways remain open—so step forward, share your vision, and together we will craft something extraordinary while the marketplace prepares to come to life. ✨ Make sure this displays within the shop tab, the public shop.
Make sure that is displayed on the shop page slash tab somewhere at the top! Number three, I want it to be styled exactly like the rest of the website.

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the Shop page shows the full provided announcement message at the top of the page content area (above the existing Shop controls/products grid).
The announcement styling matches the site’s established dark-fantasy theme and uses existing UI components/classes (no new design system introduced).
The announcement text matches the user-provided wording exactly, including the ending ✨ character.
The Shop page remains functional (controls, product list, cart drawer) and layout does not break on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be modified.
Do not add any new backend/canister APIs or schema changes for this announcement; it is a static UI addition on the Shop page.
nonGoals: Implementing e-commerce checkout or enabling online purchases.
Adding new social links/integrations beyond displaying the provided static message.
